recipesJson.name: Battered fluffy white cake
recipesJson.author: Johncox245
recipesJson.description:
Great fluffy white cake a bit undercooked just the way I like them.
 I used the flavorah cup cake batter and real flavors cake batter to make my cake undercooked as I like my cakes that way.
Used the fluffy white cake to bring the cake aspect in and for frosting.This mix is AMAZING I LOVE IT.
